ControllerBitEvent: The event raised by the SparkFun controller:bit pins
ControllerBitPin: The pins used by SparkFun controller:bit
controllerbit: Functions to operate the SparkFun controller:bit
controllerbit.isPressed: Determines if a button is pressed
controllerbit.isPressed|param|button: the pin that acts as a button
controllerbit.onEvent: Registers code to run when a controller:bit event is detected.
